about_the_game:
Overview

A multiplayer online horror game in the style of Cthulhu. Players will play as the followers of the goddess and go to the fallen demon castle to search for the traces of demons. By finding the clues of demons in every corner of the castle, they can choose to sacrifice to obtain totems to boost themselves or choose to pray to obtain weapons to eliminate demons. Finally, players need to kill the demon or complete the investigation task and safely evacuate. Through the investigation, the hidden story in the castle will be gradually uncovered.

Story Background

It is said that in the past, the invincible king and his generals lived in the castle. One day, the king was killed by his subordinate general. Before dying, the king cursed the general who murdered him and all the creatures in the entire castle. As a result, all the living beings in the castle became demons. As the followers of the goddess, players need to go to the castle to eliminate those known and unknown demons and truly purify the castle, even at the cost of their own lives.

short_description: "Devil Must Die: The Last Supper" is a horror game. It is a Cthulhu horror game where players, as the followers of the goddess, enter a castle full of demons. To win, they can either search for clues inside the castle to obtain sufficient information about the demons or eliminate the demons there.
